name: Nona
tagline: Extensions to help nonas embed images.
body:
Hello!

This repository contains source code to help nonas to embed images.

It has the following folders:
* chrome/ holds source for the chrome extension
* firefox/ holds source for the firefox extension

Each folder has a README describing how to build and install the extensions
from source.

<3,
tzbutts
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
